text: Sangitale, thika ahe. Ja, ya jagacya jivanata tujhi siksa hica ki tu mhanata rahave, mala sparsa karu naka ani eka dusara vayadahi tujhyasi ahe, jo tujhyavaruna kadhihi talanara nahi ani ata tu apalya ya daivatalahi paha, jyaca tu pujari banala hota, amhi tyala jaluna taku, maga tyala nadita curecura udavuna de'u
